mapper.select: SELECT `m`.material_id,coalesce(m.omr_notifi_no,m.sorc_no) as sorc_no, `m`.esas_no, `m`.model_id, `m`.serial_no, `m`.ocm, `m`.bound_out_ocm, `m`.`level`, `m`.direct_flg, `m`.service_repair_flg, `m`.reception_time, `m`.fix_type, `m`.agreed_date, `mdl`.name as model_name, `pf`.operate_result, `m`.scheduled_expedited, coalesce(`mp`.finish_date,`m`.outline_time) as finish_time, `m`.break_back_flg, tcs.location as wip_location,af_production_feature.action_time as filing_time FROM material m JOIN model mdl ON `m`.model_id = `mdl`.model_id JOIN production_feature pf ON `m`.material_id = `pf`.material_id AND `pf`.position_id = 47 AND `pf`.operate_result = 0 AND `pf`.action_time is null LEFT JOIN material_process mp ON mp.material_id = m.material_id AND mp.line_id = 14 LEFT JOIN turnover_case_storage tcs ON `m`.material_id = tcs.material_id LEFT JOIN fact_material ON m.material_id = fact_material.material_id LEFT JOIN af_production_feature ON fact_material.af_pf_key = af_production_feature.af_pf_key ORDER BY operate_result DESC, reception_time

SELECT `m`.material_id,coalesce(m.omr_notifi_no,m.sorc_no) as sorc_no, `m`.esas_no, `m`.model_id, `m`.serial_no, `m`.ocm, `m`.`level`, `m`.direct_flg, `m`.service_repair_flg, `m`.reception_time, `m`.fix_type, `m`.wip_location, `m`.agreed_date, `mdl`.name as model_name, `m`.inline_time, pf.finish_time as quotation_time FROM material m JOIN model mdl ON `m`.model_id = `mdl`.model_id JOIN production_feature pf ON `m`.material_id = `pf`.material_id AND `pf`.position_id = 47 AND `pf`.operate_result = 2 AND `pf`.finish_time > current_date ORDER BY quotation_time DESC

SELECT `m`.material_id, coalesce(m.omr_notifi_no,m.sorc_no) as sorc_no, `m`.esas_no, `m`.model_id, `mdl`.name as model_name, `m`.serial_no, `m`.ocm, `m`.level, `m`.direct_flg, `m`.fix_type, `m`.service_repair_flg, `m`.section_id, `m`.reception_time, `m`.scheduled_expedited, `m`.agreed_date, `mp`.finish_date as finish_time, `m`.bound_out_ocm, `m`.bound_out_package_no FROM material m JOIN model mdl ON `m`.model_id = `mdl`.model_id LEFT JOIN material_process mp ON mp.material_id = m.material_id AND mp.line_id = 14 WHERE `m`.material_id = #{material_id};
